item.title: Pricing insights from historical data (part 1)
item.description: Problem context What influeces price? Significance vs effect size Closing note How have influential factors changed over time? Identify abnormalities / abnormalities? Appendix Pricing challenges Dataset considerations Regularization and colinear variables Coefficients of a regularized model “All models are wrong, but some are useful.” -George Box Problem context Setting prices for large complicated products is challenging, particularly in business to business (B2B) contexts.
